A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Absolute garbage. Disney literally spit on the characters Luke Skywalker and Yoda\, along with everything about them from the OT and prequels. They made a mockery of Leia\, and therefore Carrie Fisher\, in one of the most cringeworthy scenes ever to hit the screen. They turned Snokes into a cartoon background villain. The plot and backstory are ridiculous. And every interesting question raised in TFA is just ignored or hand waved in this movie. It's as if this is a soft reboot of TFA.

A sad\, pathetic\, cringe inducing reboot.

They way they butchered Luke's character though...having grown up with Star Wars I feel like I've been punched in the gut.

Don't buy tickets to this movie. Don't rent it. Don't even watch it once it's available for free. It's absolute trash.
